Contains auto loader for lazy loading. Allows class fetching for loading classes from particular modules Can be accessed by the string 'loader'.

class test implements \sambhuti\core\iContainer {
    static $dependencies = array('loader');
    public $loader = null;

    function __construct(\sambhuti\loader\iLoader $loader) {
        $this->loader = $loader;
    }
}
Array of [namespace => Path] for lazy loading
Registers loader::get() as the autoload method
Autoloader to load the classes under all lazy paths

tag.name: param
tag.description: name of the class to be loaded

docblock.long-description: Looks for a file and require_once it if it exists

tag.name: param
tag.description: partial path or class name to look for.

docblock.long-description: Looks for a class in all registered paths and returns the class name if matches else gives null

tag.description: name of class to look for

tag.name: return
tag.description: string full class name if class exists else null

tag.description: string path if $key exists else boolean false

docblock.long-description: Get all lazyPath from loader

Container for request and response objects Differentiates between web and cli request and populates the request object appropriately Can be accessed by the string 'request'. As the get method is supposed to give out \sambhuti\core\iData instance every 'request.*' should be marked with \sambhuti\core\iData

use sambhuti\core;
class test implements core\iContainer {
    static $dependencies = array('request','request.request','request.response');
    public $requestContainer = null;
    public $request = null;
    public $response = null;

    function __construct(\sambhuti\request\iContainer $container,core\iData $request, core\iData $response) {
        $this->requestContainer = $container;
        $this->request = $request;
        $this->response = $response;
    }
}
Stores request data later passed to controller
Stores response data later passed to controller
Determines Command line or web request based on ISCLI constant and executes the relevant method. Initializes request and response objects
Implements abstract Get method Gives \sambhuti\request\request::$response on type 'response' and \sambhuti\request\request::$request otherwise
Parses REQUEST_URI to determine the command and returns other standard request parameters

tag.name: return
tag.description: list of options for request data

docblock.long-description: Command is always 'cli' gives 'argv' and 'argc' for request

tag.name: return
tag.description: list of options for request data

All config files are loaded and stored by this class
Array of [namespace => Path] for lazy loading
Last path in lazy paths
Sets lazy Path and default path (last lazy path)
Takes in string identifier eg: "file" and makes it into config/file.php Runs through all available lazy paths.
Saves data in a config object to the default path (last lazy path) Path can be overridden by $lazyId namespace to the path.
